messages.message: Hey Ben! We can’t add new libraries without making code changes. However, if the correct version of pytorch is already available in app-tasks and their model is actually very small (< 50 MB in size), they can run it via a Refiner or Flow UDF.
If they upgrade to October, they can run it using model-service, which is designed to handle larger models and has more machine learning libraries available.

Actually, I just checked app-tasks and PyTorch is *not* available there. The recommendation would be to upgrade to the October release. I’m guessing that’s not very desirable on their end? It might be helpful for us to have a quick sync depending on the urgency of this ask
@lydia this isn’t a hugely demanding ask, its a small use case - we are upgrading JPMC to 22.01 in April, so this use case can wait until then
